main event: A bright object with regularly illuminating lighting in a circular pattern was sighted in Dawson City, Canada, on November 16, 1961.
interesting points: The observation lasted between 1 to 2 seconds,The object was described as bright and moving,It traveled from south to north in an arc before disappearing in a northerly direction,The observation was made by a couple, aged 45 to 60, who were convinced it was a flying object,The weather conditions were reported as clear with good visibility.
